thread.title: Genesis Gaming Launches Star Crystals on OpenBet Platform Exclusively for Sky Vegas
thread.title_full: Genesis Gaming Launches Star Crystals on OpenBet Platform Exclusively for Sky Vegas - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Genesis Gaming Launches Star Crystals on OpenBet Platform Exclusively for Sky Vegas
text:
Genesis Gaming
LONDON , October 13,
Video Slot Game available as Dual Release in both Flash and HTML5
Genesis Gaming is pleased to announce the launch of Star Crystals , a video slot game with a fun and friendly science fiction theme. Designed for both mobile and desktop use, Star Crystals is an All Pays (243 Ways) 5 reel game with multiple random features and a free spins bonus round. The game is available now on the OpenBet platform and is offered exclusively for Sky Vegas .
(Logo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150805/255608LOGO )
(Photo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151012/275955 )
"We are highly focused on providing entertaining and engaging player experiences," said James Watson , Director of European Sales. "This game has many quirky animated characters and several exciting features that only add to the enjoyment."
The focus of this fast and fun science fiction game is a galactic mission to find and protect valuable Star Crystals . This game will keep you entertained with three Base Game Features in the form of the Win Multiplier up to x5, Robot Added Wilds and Crystal Pick Credit Award that can be triggered randomly on any spin during the game. Three or more Scatters award 8 Free Spins with a x2 Multiplier and free Spins may be re-triggered with 3 Scatters for unlimited re-triggers.
"This game has much to offer for both the casual and serious gambler," said Scott Sims , Head of Global Design at Genesis Gaming. "It combines frequent modest wins with interactive, entertaining random features for casual players along with a bonus feature that can result in substantial wins for the serious gambler."
Travel through the galaxy safeguarding the Star Crystals and be rewarded for your efforts!
For more information and to play the demo link click here .
To view the Star Crystals game tease click here or to view the Star Crystals full game trailer click here .
About Genesis Gaming
As a key supplier of slot content to the most prominent manufacturers and operators in the casino gaming industry, Genesis Gaming has built its reputation on providing casino gaming content that maximizes revenue for our customers. With over 150 video slot games produced, Genesis has world-class game designers and develops games for all digital platforms whether they are land-based, online or mobile, and for real-money or social gaming play. More information on Genesis can be found at: http://www.gen-game.com
James Watson
Director, European Sales
+44-(0)2070-360775
